infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to capture photos for sharing inspirational moments and creating visual content to enhance your daily motivation experience.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to let you select and share inspirational images as part of your daily motivation content.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs permission to save inspirational quotes and images to your photo library for easy access and sharing.
